data.lyric:

data.subject: Death Of A King
data.lyric:

data.subject: The Skull
data.lyric:
Carried by restless winds
 Under the crimson cloud
 I sailed the purple waves
 Aboard my comely ship

data.subject: Bad Blood
data.lyric:
Break down the weirs on the brooks
 Crush the bulwarks of my soul
 Let the rapids run white and foam
